markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This is an ancient ship converted into a workroom. It is the makeshift home of [Copperhead](/copperhead/), who has spent years collecting the bits of detritus that line each surface and corner of the workshop.

## Points of interest

* The hold is filled with rusted tools of war, rusted through completely. There's not much of interest to be found, save for [Nikki](/nikki/).

## Characters

* [Copperhead](/copperhead/): After visiting him at [The Pickled Eel](/thePickledEel/), you learn that the Boathouse is his home. He will be wondering around the area upon leaving the tavern.

## Loot

* [Ring of Minor Protection](/ringOfMinorProtection/): in a drawer under the bed.
* [Mouth Char](/mouthChar/): In a basket near Nikki.
* [Nikki](/nikki/): In the southeast corner.

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This is an ancient ship converted into a workroom. It is the makeshift home of [[Copperhead]], who has spent years collecting the bits of detritus that line each surface and corner of the workshop.

==Points of interest==
* The hold is filled with rusted tools of war, rusted through completely. There's not much of interest to be found, save for [[Nikki]].

==Characters==
* [[Copperhead]]: After visiting him at [[The Pickled Eel]], you learn that the Boathouse is his home. He will be wondering around the area upon leaving the tavern.

==Loot==
* [[Ring of Minor Protection]]: in a drawer under the bed.
* [[Mouth Char]]: In a basket near Nikki.
* [[Nikki]]: In the southeast corner.
